snippet.title: Amber Heard steps out with new girlfriend Bianca Butti at WME pre-Oscar event... following the relea
snippet.description: Amber Heard stepped out with her new girlfriend Bianca Butti at a WME Pre-Oscar event in Los Angeles on Friday.The Aquaman star's, 33, appearance comes just days after an explosive audio resurfaced where she admitted to hitting ex-husband Johnny Depp. Amber wore a black figure-hugging satin dress with a deep plunging neckline for the star-studded event.    Amber teamed the item of clothing with a collection of silver necklaces, patent leather heel boots and a satin handbag.She styled her blonde locks into a voluminous crimped hairdo, she added a slick of make-up which included a bold red lipstick.  Meanwhile her girlfriend Bianca looked stylish in a black trouser suit with a crisp white shirt and pointed slip-on loafers.It comes after new audio recordings emerged recently of Amber admitting to losing her temper and hitting her ex-husband Johnny Depp.    Amber, 33, was previously married to Depp from 2015 until 2017, and the former couple have been locked in a bitter legal battle ever since, after Amber accused Johnny of physically abusing her during their marriage. And last week Dailymail.com exclusively obtained audio recordings where The Rum Diary actress admits to 'hitting' her ex-husband and pelting him with pots, pans and vases in an explosive audio confession.The Aquaman star opens up about her violent tantrums in a series of taped conversations the estranged couple made in 2015 as they tried to talk through their marriage problems during a therapy session.    Since her claims of domestic abuse, the Pirates of the Caribbean star has been pursuing legal action to sue Amber for defamation, and last year, Amber responded to the lawsuit to detail a number of alleged incidents in which he abused her, where she claimed Johnny was often too 'drunk' to remember what had happened. The defamation case is set to begin in August this year, after being pushed back from its February start date after Johnny failed to meet a deadline to submit records of his drug and alcohol use. Meanwhile, Amber is reportedly romancing Bianca Butti after the two have been spotted together at several events. The Aquaman actress is believed to have struck up a romance with the 38-year-old cinematographer, as sources say the pair are 'dating and hooking up', with Amber reportedly already feeling comfortable with 'holding hands' in public.An insider told Us Weekly magazine: 'Amber and Bianca are dating and hooking up. Amber is not trying to be low key about it.'[Amber] feels comfortable kissing Bianca and holding her hands in public at this point. They started as friends and it turned into something more.'
